thread.title: KPMG Acts Globally But Keeps Scandals Local

author: Michael Rapoport
title: KPMG Acts Globally But Keeps Scandals Local
text:
Accounting firm KPMG is under fire over three different scandals in the U.S., South Africa and the U.K. Or is it?
KPMG does face trouble on three frontsâ€”but technically it is happening at three legally separate firms. KPMG LLP, a New York-based U.S. partnership, is dealing with the indictment of former partners on charges they helped steal secret regulatory information.
